name: Condenser Death Stalker
desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can target 1 other Cyberse monster you control; while this card is face-up on the field, that face-up monster gains 800 ATK. If this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed by a card effect and sent to the GY: Each player takes 800 damage. You can only use this effect of "Condenser Death Stalker" once per turn.
